title: 75 US-trained rebels enter Syria from Turkey: monitor
content:
A batch of 75 rebels newly trained by US and coalition forces in Turkey to fight jihadists have entered northern Syria, a monitoring group told AFP on Sunday. Beirut (AFP) | 20 September 2015 8:17 

“Seventy-five new fighters trained in a camp near the Turkish capital entered Aleppo province between Friday night and Saturday morning,” said Rami Abdel Rahman, director of the Syrian Observatory for Human Rights.

© 2015 AFP
